website_summaries.verdict: A worthwhile steam auto-curler with almost all the features of pricier models. But be prepared to look online for details about how to use it.
pros: Features right, left, and auto direction settings along with three different timer settings and multiple temperature options
This means lots of options for natural-looking curls
Also has a 60-minute automatic shut-off for safety
cons: Like other less expensive models, this one doesn't come with instructions and the steam chamber can be difficult to fill

customer_reviews.title: Works on long hair!
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works. You just have to use small strips of hair, which the directions explain, and make sure the hair is brushed. The steam works and does not burn our hair. We are hispanic and have a lot of long, thin hair. My daughter puts in about 10" of hair at a time and it curls the entire strip. The machine does not seem to get hot on the outside. It only takes about 8-10 seconds per strip for a good curl. That's about the same amount of time as I use on my curling iron, but this gives our long hair that pretty long curl look. Works great!
